languages.text: "Это утверждение ложно". {n}Голос из динамика становится суше и спокойнее.{/n} "Богопротивные аугментации встроены в технический цикл работы моей Истинной плоти. Прямолинейное их иссечение вызовет прекращение жизненных функций с неопределенным, но высоким процентом вероятности".

"This statement is false." {n}The voice from the speaker becomes drier and calmer.{/n} "The impure augmentations were inserted into the technical cycle of the operation of my True Flesh. Their direct excision will, with an undetermined yet high degree of probability, cause the cessation of my vital functions."
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение ложно". {n}Голос из динамика становится суше и спокойнее.{/n} "Богопротивные аугментации встроены в технический цикл работы моей Истинной плоти. Прямолинейное их иссечение вызовет прекращение жизненных функций с неопределенным, но высоким процентом вероятности".

Their direct excision will, with an undetermined yet high degree of probability, cause the cessation of my vital functions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この発言は嘘です」{n}スピーカーからの声がよりドライに、そして穏やかになる。{/n}「不純な増強装置が自分の真の肉体の動作の技術的サイクルに挿入されました。その直接の除去は、未確定ですが高い確率で自分の生命機能の停止を引き起こします」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false." {n}The voice from the speaker becomes drier and calmer.{/n} "The impure augmentations were inserted into the technical cycle of the operation of my True Flesh. Their direct excision will, with an undetermined yet high degree of probability, cause the cessation of my vital functions."

traits.locale_text: 「この発言は嘘です」{n}スピーカーからの声がよりドライに、そして穏やかになる。{/n}「不純な増強装置が自分の真の肉体の動作の技術的サイクルに挿入されました。その直接の除去は、未確定ですが高い確率で自分の生命機能の停止を引き起こします」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。”{n}帕斯卡的声音变得更加枯槁，更加平静。{/n}“邪恶的植入物已经被插入了我的实肉运行的技术循环之中。如果直接切除这些植入物，有一定概率会导致我的生命机能停止，虽然目前无法确定具体概率，但概率非常高。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false." {n}The voice from the speaker becomes drier and calmer.{/n} "The impure augmentations were inserted into the technical cycle of the operation of my True Flesh. Their direct excision will, with an undetermined yet high degree of probability, cause the cessation of my vital functions."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。”{n}帕斯卡的声音变得更加枯槁，更加平静。{/n}“邪恶的植入物已经被插入了我的实肉运行的技术循环之中。如果直接切除这些植入物，有一定概率会导致我的生命机能停止，虽然目前无法确定具体概率，但概率非常高。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta afirmación es falsa». {n}La voz del altavoz se vuelve más seca y calmada.{/n} «Los aumentos impuros fueron insertados en el ciclo técnico del funcionamiento de mi Verdadera Carne. Su escisión directa causará, con un indeterminado pero alto grado de probabilidad, el cese de mis funciones vitales».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false." {n}The voice from the speaker becomes drier and calmer.{/n} "The impure augmentations were inserted into the technical cycle of the operation of my True Flesh. Their direct excision will, with an undetermined yet high degree of probability, cause the cessation of my vital functions."

traits.locale_text: «Esta afirmación es falsa». {n}La voz del altavoz se vuelve más seca y calmada.{/n} «Los aumentos impuros fueron insertados en el ciclo técnico del funcionamiento de mi Verdadera Carne. Su escisión directa causará, con un indeterminado pero alto grado de probabilidad, el cese de mis funciones vitales».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt." {n}Die Stimme aus dem Lautsprecher wird trockener und ruhiger.{/n} "Die unreinen Augmentationen wurden in den technischen Zyklus des Betriebs meines Wahren Fleischs eingesetzt. Schneidet man sie direkt heraus, so wird das mit einer unbezifferten, aber hohen Wahrscheinlichkeit zur Einstellung meiner Vitalfunktionen führen."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false." {n}The voice from the speaker becomes drier and calmer.{/n} "The impure augmentations were inserted into the technical cycle of the operation of my True Flesh. Their direct excision will, with an undetermined yet high degree of probability, cause the cessation of my vital functions."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. {n}Die Stimme aus dem Lautsprecher wird trockener und ruhiger.{/n} "Die unreinen Augmentationen wurden in den technischen Zyklus des Betriebs meines Wahren Fleischs eingesetzt. Schneidet man sie direkt heraus, so wird das mit einer unbezifferten, aber hohen Wahrscheinlichkeit zur Einstellung meiner Vitalfunktionen führen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée, » {n}répond Pasqal sur un ton sec, mais calme.{/n} « Les augmentations impures ont été insérées dans le cycle opérationnel technique de ma chair véritable. Bien qu'encore indéterminée, la probabilité pour que leur excision provoque l'arrêt de mes fonctions vitales est très élevée. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false." {n}The voice from the speaker becomes drier and calmer.{/n} "The impure augmentations were inserted into the technical cycle of the operation of my True Flesh. Their direct excision will, with an undetermined yet high degree of probability, cause the cessation of my vital functions."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée, » {n}répond Pasqal sur un ton sec, mais calme.{/n} « Les augmentations impures ont été insérées dans le cycle opérationnel technique de ma chair véritable. Bien qu'encore indéterminée, la probabilité pour que leur excision provoque l'arrêt de mes fonctions vitales est très élevée. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış." {n}Hoparlörden çıkan ses, daha duygusuz ve sakin bir tona geçiyor.{/n} "Murdar ogmentasyonlar, Salt Suret'imin işleminin teknik döngüsüne yerleştirilmiş. Bu ogmentasyonların bedenimden doğrudan çıkarılması, belirsiz ancak büyük bir olasılıkla hayati fonksiyonlarımın son bulmasına sebep olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false." {n}The voice from the speaker becomes drier and calmer.{/n} "The impure augmentations were inserted into the technical cycle of the operation of my True Flesh. Their direct excision will, with an undetermined yet high degree of probability, cause the cessation of my vital functions."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış." {n}Hoparlörden çıkan ses daha duygusuz ve sakin bir havaya bürünüyor.{/n} "Murdar ogmentasyonlar, Salt Suret'imin işleminin teknik döngüsüne yerleştirilmiş. Bu ogmentasyonların bedenimden doğrudan çıkarılması, belirsiz ancak büyük bir olasılıkla hayati fonksiyonlarımın son bulmasına sebep olacaktır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
